thread.title: Mackie Research Initiates Coverage of Emerita Resources

author: cnbc.com
title: Mackie Research Initiates Coverage of Emerita Resources
text:
TORONTO, March 28, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Emerita Resources Corp. (“Emerita” or the “Company”) (TSXV:EMO) announces that Mackie Research Capital Corp. (“Mackie”) has initiated coverage on the Company following the completion of the acquisition of the Salobro project in Brazil by Emerita.
About Emerita Resources Corp.
Emerita is a natural resource company engaged in the acquisition, exploration and development of mineral properties in Europe, with a primary focus on exploring in Spain and Brazil. The Company’s corporate office and technical teams are based in Sevilla, Spain and Belo Horizonte, Brazil with an administrative office in Toronto, Canada.
